alignments.description: Code4z is an extension pack for Visual Studio Code and can be used as an all-in-one mainframe extension package for developers working with z/OS applications, suitable for all levels of mainframe experience, even beginners.

968aba82-28fb-49f6-bcdd-39d5f9f75cfa.description: The earner of this badge has proven expertise in DevOps by demonstrating the ability to install, troubleshoot and provide formal training in Broadcom DevOps solutions. They have experience with architecture design and deployment of DevOps solutions, facilitated adoption amongst clients, spoken at technical conferences, and proven their leadership as a Subject Matter Expert.
968aba82-28fb-49f6-bcdd-39d5f9f75cfa.name: DevOps Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Broadcom. Mainframe leadership approval is required to earn this badge.

Technical lead deploys & implements Broadcom DevOps solutions in customer production environments: Brightside Zowe CLI; Zowe API Mediation Layer; Endevor Integrations for Enterprise DevOps; Broadcom Product Zowe Conformant CLI Plug-ins, or Visual Studio Code extensions, including but not limited to: Endevor, Endevor Bridge for Git, File Master Plus, IDMS, JCLCheck, Workload Automation, MAT Analyze, MAT Detect, OPS/MVS, Spool, SYSVIEW Performance Management, View Workload Automation CA-7 Edition.

Engage in early validation calls and product demos with customers leading discussions around aspects around DevOps and Modernization solutions. As the Subject Matter Expert, represent the voice of the customer feedback to Broadcom DevOps teams.

The practitioner is a member of the Broadcom DevOps adoption team who partners with customers to assist with defining a plan for implementing DevOps, including understanding use cases, ways in which they might be able to enable different forms of automation using the technology, issues they may be having configuring, or using the technology, resource skills and roles required to implement DevOps.
Create and lead hands-on training for customers and partners on Broadcom's DevOps products and solutions.
Present at technical conferences covering topics such as best practices, experiences, use cases, and educating Mainframe users on modernization to accelerate innovation.

Recognized subject matter expert who demonstrates the ability to solve problems with Zowe solution set, including the API ML, Zowe CLI, and various plugins. The Practitioner is called upon to resolve customers' escalated problems with deploying and using Broadcom solutions.
The Practitioner has earned the following badges:
DevOps Principles - Foundational
Infrastructure Management with CA Brightside
Mainframe DevOps with CA Brightside
CA Endevor® - Developer - Foundational
